customer_comments.comment: “Working with Bereketli Logistika has been very reliable and easy. They ensure every shipment is delivered accurately and on time. Their customer service is always attentive and helpful, and whenever I have a question or request, they provide a solution immediately.”

about.desc_1: Stay updated on your shipment’s journey with our accurate real-time tracking system.
about.desc_2: Enjoy a seamless shipping experience with our convenient pickup and delivery service.
about.desc_3: Protect your valuable shipments with our reliable insurance options.
about.desc_4: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist with any questions or concerns.
about.desc_5: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist with any questions or concerns.
about.desc_6: Manage and track your shipments directly from your smartphone with our user-friendly mobile app.

privacy.name: Privacy
privacy.intro_description: Our privacy policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and protected. This page describes how your data is handled when you use our services.
privacy.we_following_info: We may collect the following information
privacy.personal_desc: Your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information
privacy.order_desc: Your orders, delivery addresses, and logistics information
privacy.teh_desc: Your IP address, browser type, time of use, and other automatically collected information
privacy.use_info_desc: We use the collected information for the following purposes
privacy.service_desc: Processing your orders and providing logistics services
privacy.info_security_desc: We use established technical and organizational measures to protect your information. We ensure your data is kept secure through strong encryption, protected servers, and regulated access mechanisms.
privacy.cookies_desc: We use cookies to personalize our website and improve your user experience. You can manage cookies through your browser settings.
privacy.r3: Objecting to the processing of your data
privacy.desc: If you have any questions or complaints about our privacy policy, please contact us using the information below
privacy.updates_desc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page and the "Last updated" date will be revised. We recommend reviewing this page periodically to stay informed about any changes in the policy.

warning.password_length: Password must be longer than 6 characters!
